body_html:
@karllessard and I (with guidance from @asimshankar) have consolidated ideas on this thread into a proposal for the API. We'd love to hear your feedback, so please continue to add comments on this issue.

We'd also like to help move things forward via code contributions, and Karl and I plan to start some related PRs. Please let us know if you're interested/working on something related, so we can jointly work to bring Java bindings for Tensorflow operators.
body_text:
@karllessard and I (with guidance from @asimshankar) have consolidated ideas on this thread into a proposal for the API. We'd love to hear your feedback, so please continue to add comments on this issue.
We'd also like to help move things forward via code contributions, and Karl and I plan to start some related PRs. Please let us know if you're interested/working on something related, so we can jointly work to bring Java bindings for Tensorflow operators.
body:
@karllessard and I (with guidance from @asimshankar) have consolidated ideas on this thread into [a proposal for the API](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kJ1lak4OIz0b7N6am3PSRe6i1enZgRHjbj8U-8PJ68w/edit?usp=sharing). We'd love to hear your feedback, so please continue to add comments on this issue.

We'd also like to help move things forward via code contributions, and Karl and I plan to start some related PRs. Please let us know if you're interested/working on something related, so we can jointly work to bring Java bindings for Tensorflow operators.
